detail_desc: Pile-lined jacket in washed denim with an appliqué at the top, pile collar and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and welt side pockets.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Fake fly and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and wide elastication at the hems.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a round, lace-trimmed neckline, inset lace at the top, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flare to the hem. Straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the sole. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lined triangle bikini top with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Ties at the back and back of the neck. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Jacket in coated cotton twill with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Faux shearling lining. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sturdy, fully lined sports swimsuit with a visible zip with a long tab at the back for easy zipping and unzipping.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide cuffs.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in jersey containing glittery threads with a twisted detail at the hem.
Flared dress in glittery tulle with a round, satin-trimmed, gathered neckline. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Underdress with a print motif at the hem.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Biker jacket with quilted sections, shoulder tabs and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, and zipped side pockets at the front. Lined.

Short skirt in a slightly stretchy, patterned weave with a wrapover, pleated front and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at one side. Concealed buttoning on the inside of the waistband and shaping darts at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized jumper in a fine cotton knit with a checked pattern, a roll-edge neckline and low dropped shoulders. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Sarong in a viscose weave with ties at the top and a small hole to thread the tie through after winding it around the waist. Flounced trim at the hem.
Metal chain necklace with pendants in various designs. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm.
Double-layered hairbands in jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Glittery tulle skirt with an elastic waistband. Lined.
Fine-knit gloves in various colours.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Relaxed Fit.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Hat in soft thermal fleece.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit containing some alpaca wool. Width approx. 53 cm, circumference approx. 150 cm.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Microfibre body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an opening and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and laser-cut hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Long balloon sleeves with a narrow trim and covered button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft weave with a lace yoke and button placket. Scalloped lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Small backpack in imitation leather with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 11x21x26 cm.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length chiffon dress with a grandad collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and lower down the skirt. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Trainers in nylon and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and patterned soles.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a decorative bow on each shoulder.
Shorts in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, textured cotton knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with cuffs and decorative buttons. Unlined.
Dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed fastening, and a concealed zip in one side. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a flounced, two-tiered skirt.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.

Short shirt dress in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crinkled weave with a lace yoke and frills. Small, frilled collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a rubber print on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Extra layer in woven fabric at the hem with a scalloped edge and decorative buttons.
Metal necklace with metal wire flowers and an adjustable fastener.
Skater skirt in a fine knit with terry appliqués and an elasticated waist.

Set in soft sweatshirt fabric with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers. Boxy-style top with dropped shoulders, an embroidered detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leather sandals with covered block heels and narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Calf-length, fitted dress in a rib knit with a polo neck, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt under the bust. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Cutaway collar, French front, yoke at the back, cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with pendants in various sizes and designs. Length approx. 11 cm.

Long dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the bottom creating a voluminous, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined at the top.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
